Who I Am

Hello, I'm Christian

I'm a passionate web developer and car enthusiast from Kenya. I love creating beautiful, functional websites and have a deep interest in automotive design and technology.

My journey in web development started at a young age when I discovered my passion for coding and design. I enjoy the process of bringing ideas to life through code and creating experiences that people love to use.

When I'm not coding, you can find me researching cars (especially the Toyota Supra MK4), watching football (I'm a big Ronaldo fan!), or spending time with animals. I believe in continuous learning and always strive to improve my skills.
